mapper.update: update delivery_receipt set start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_City = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_City = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_Date = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceipt_ID = #{deliveryreceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceipt_ID, start_city, end_City, mid_City, make_Date, Comments from delivery_receipt
